response.job_title: Zone FEI Leader, ZITEC at Anheuser-Busch InBev
response.summary:
10 years of project management experience/Packaging materials expert / Innovation leader. 

Ability to define, develop and execute innovation projects.

Ability to lead cross-functional teams and multi-disciplinary projects. 

Ability to define project scope, execution plan and team structure for project implementation.

Strong understanding of Key Performance Indicators (KPI’s) and how they relate to a business.

Ability to communicate with and have impact and influence on network of resources and senior managers.

Mechanically inclined to understand packaging and systems processes, strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
response.skills: Resolución de problemas, Liderazgo de equipos multidisciplinarios, comunicación asertiva, Creatividad, Pensamiento de diseño

profile_positions.description: Manage innovation workflow for packaging projects across the zone
profile_positions.title: Front End Innovation Leader

profile_positions.description:
Responsable de gestionar proyectos de innovación e ingeniería de valor en 13 países de Latinoamérica.
Desarrollo de nuevos materiales de empaque, optimización de procesos productivos, estandarización de procedimientos de gestión e innovación
Líder de proyectos de sostenibilidad en Colombia, Perú y Ecuador.
Coordinador de especialistas para la zona middle americas.
profile_positions.title: Coordinador de Proyectos de Packaging para Middle Americas

profile_positions.description: Liderar proyectos relacionados con el desarrollo, implemntación y optimización de materiales de empaques.
profile_positions.title: Especialista de Empaques

profile_positions.description: Responsable del aseguramiento de los estándares de calidad en línea de producción, validación y ejecución de análisis físico químicos, control de calidad y monitoreo de procesos en líneas de embotellado y planta de agua.
profile_positions.title: Analista de aseguramiento de la calidad

profile_positions.description:
Responsable de ejecutar protocolos relacionados con la implemntacion de matareiales de empaque.
Monitoreo y recepción de materias primas, seguimiento y control de planes de acción para la mejora de procesos.
profile_positions.title: Analista de empaques

profile_positions.description: Desarrollo y evaluación de nuevos productos desde la perspectiva técnica y financiera.
profile_positions.title: Analista de Innovación y Desarrollo

company.name: AB InBev
company.description:
As a company, we dream big to create a future with more cheers. We are always looking to serve up new ways to meet life’s moments, move our industry forward and make a meaningful impact in the world. We are committed to building great brands that stand the test of time and to brewing the best beers using the finest ingredients.

Our diverse portfolio of well over 500 beer brands includes global brands Budweiser®, Corona® and Stella Artois®; multi-country brands Beck’s®, Hoegaarden®, Leffe® and Michelob ULTRA®; and local champions such as Aguila®, Antarctica®, Bud Light®, Brahma®, Cass®, Castle®, Castle Lite®, Cristal®, Harbin®, Jupiler®, Modelo Especial®, Quilmes®, Victoria®, Sedrin®, and Skol®.

Our brewing heritage dates back more than 600 years, spanning continents and generations. From our European roots at the Den Hoorn brewery in Leuven, Belgium. To the pioneering spirit of the Anheuser & Co brewery in St. Louis, US. To the creation of the Castle Brewery in South Africa during the Johannesburg gold rush. To Bohemia, the first brewery in Brazil.

Geographically diversified with a balanced exposure to developed and developing markets, we leverage the collective strengths of approximately 167,000 colleagues based in nearly 50 countries worldwide.
